Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\acquia_lift\Form\AdminSettingsForm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
